snippet: Raich won 14 medals at major championships, including gold in giant slalom and slalom at the 2006 Turin Games, and 36 World Cup races — more than any other active male skier.
abstract: Olympic champion skier Benjamin Raich retires after 19 years of competing on Alpine skiing World Cup circuit.
lead_paragraph: Raich won 14 medals at major championships, including gold in giant slalom and slalom at the 2006 Turin Games, and 36 World Cup races — more than any other active male skier.
